text:
Western / global casual:
- Relaxed oversized tees and shirts with clean Korean style trousers
- Straight and wide leg pants with minimal sneakers
- Co ord sets, muted earthy tones and soft knits

Indian / festive:
- Pastel and earthy kurtas with subtle embroidery
- Lightweight Nehru jackets and kurta co ord sets
- Simple sherwanis and juttis with minimal details

Use this only for light trend flavour.
